name: Computational Designs
description: Processing & p5.js experiments - minimal looping GIFs I've made throughout the years

name: GO Make Friends
description: React.JS & Firestore experiment - webpage to share Pokemon Go friend codes

name: LIDAR Scanner
description: Three.js unfinished experiment/proof-of-concept - a 3D world in which you can move around and scan objects. Inspired by Scanner Sombre, this is my first foray into 3D rendering for the web.

name: Old site
description: Archive of original site, made in HTML, SCSS and JavaScript from 2020-2022. I've since migrated to a more mobile first approach using React/Tailwind but this was the first full-fledged site I made and I'm still proud of it!

name: ArcCheck Archiving System
description: University project - Site proposed for Lincoln County Hospital to automate the archiving of key data from ArcCheck Radiotherapy scans

name: Ellipses
description: p5.js experiment - changing sine & cosine ratio with respect to time when translating x and y positions, to form circles, waves and more. Uses dat.gui to allow for user to play with variables.

name: Where's Wally?
description: University project - a C++ application which performs a Nearest Neighbour search on a Where's Wally scene to finally find him after all this time.

name: PollAnywhere
description: University project - a social media-like platform centered around asking & answering polls. Mobile app created in React Native.

name: Machine Learning
description: University projects - Implementing K-means clustering in Python, and creating Artificial Neural Network and Random Forest classification models

name: Today's Vibe
description: Twitter API experiment - a custom bot which tweets a random nonsensical "vibe" every day at noon.

name: Password Tester
description: React.JS experiment - a component which checks and scores passwords based on their security, and gives the user feedback on how to improve their passwords.
